Html:
hi,

i am using GMAP.NET. it's wonderful.

i have downloaded the latest version, and using it. i want to be able to zoom non-discretely. but i think this version does not support this kind of zoom.

so, i downloaded the demo and used the new GMAP.NET.core.dll in the project. but i have faced some issues.

the first is that when the map is scrolled the center point of zoom is not the center of the map. the second issue is that my OnMarkEnter events do not fire when i enter a marker( i know that i have to change the size of the marker. i did that for the previous version and it worked ).

i would be grateful if you could help me.

regards.
